DocumentationDefinitionList.Heading: Context menu options for a single module

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Opens a dialog that shows the modules package name, name and description and lists all resource types declared in this module (with name and id).

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Opens a dialog for editing the module. The dialog is similar to the one for adding a new module, but hides settings that should not be changed.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Removes the module and deletes all resources belonging to the module

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Exports the module, including all module resources. A zip file is produces that can be imported again. The module itself remains on the system unchanged.

Description.name: Description0
Description.content: Opens the module folder in the explorer.
